publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3009# Helen Eadie: Dunfermline Press and West Fife Advertiser and Scottish Local Newspaper of the Year Award 2002â€”That the Parliament congratulates the Dunfermline Press and West Fife Advertiser on winning the Scottish Local Newspaper of the Year Award 2002; recognises the massive contribution that the paper makes to the life of the community in west Fife, and acknowledges the vital role of local newspapers throughout Scotland in providing news and a voice that is sensitive to local concerns.

S1M-3009# Helen Eadie: Dunfermline Press and West Fife Advertiser and Scottish Local Newspaper of the Year Award 2002-That the Parliament congratulates the Dunfermline Press and West Fife Advertiser on winning the Scottish Local Newspaper of the Year Award 2002; recognises the massive contribution that the paper makes to the life of the community in west Fife, and acknowledges the vital role of local newspapers throughout Scotland in providing news and a voice that is sensitive to local concerns.
S1M-3009# Dunfermline Press and West Fife Advertiser and Scottish Local Newspaper of the Year Award 2002 (lodged on 18 April 2002) Phil Gallie*
S1M-3009# Dunfermline Press and West Fife Advertiser and Scottish Local Newspaper of the Year Award 2002 (lodged on 18 April 2002) Mr Keith Raffan*, Mr Jamie Stone*
S1M-3009# Dunfermline Press and West Fife Advertiser and Scottish Local Newspaper of the Year Award 2002 (lodged on 18 April 2002) Brian Fitzpatrick*
